|802dot11_protocols = none |defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = Delta Networks |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 08/2013 |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00E9WBBI0 |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "2976513800", "Model: P12609-10" and "UL94V-0" are silkscreened on board. ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Fortinet]] FortiSoC2 (ARM v4l) @900MHz *Storage: 8GB (NAND) Flash, 32GB (SSD) *Memory: 2GB (DDR3L) SDRAM *Network: 16x 1GbE ports *USB: 2x USB 2.0 port *Power Source: 12V/2.5A via 2-pin Molex ARM926EJ-S based FortiSOC2
2X BROADCOM 53138KQLEG swithes

FORTINET INC.
